author: Chris Roche
content: There is much I could say about sailing with JST from personal experience but won`t except privately since speaking out only brings corporate complaint.

author: Tim McFeely
content: See https://jst.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/Annual-Report-31-March-2018.pdf for last years financials. The salary and benefit amounts do not seem out of line. Running about 1/3 of the total operating cost is about standard in most industry/business models. I do question the seemingly year additions to the staff, when it is obvious that money is slowly bleeding out. Throwing more people at a problem is usually not the right approach. Throwing the right people at the problem is.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: I have only found accounts information up to 2014 with no record of staff costs and emoluments. I would be most interested to learn about how much the directors of the charity are taking home before I consider a donation.
